ygData.subject: Trade Skills
ygData.msgSnippet: because some where talking about tradeskills in the recent posts, i want to point out the EQ Traders Corner at http://www.eqtraders.com and give the
ygData.messageBody:
because some where talking about tradeskills in the recent posts,
i want to point out the "EQ Traders Corner" at

http://www.eqtraders.com

and give the following hint: read ... ;-)

especially players new to the game should checkout the pages, because
there are many answers.

the really bad thing about this page: there are sooooo many nice pieces
you may make, but you almost can't do, because of rare dropping stuff
from very high creatures.

but with the new quests/recipes added, even newbies can do other things
than killing critters all the time.


sometimes it is worth to check out Allakhazam

http://everquest.allakhazam.com/

as well, because some things are (parts of) quests.


Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
level 53 female gnome magician
Tarew Marr
